name: Sneaky paws
description:
Sneaky paws: Secret Mischief Mission

You hear the door open and you can’t contain your excitement. Your owner is home and you are reunited – together again! You're full of energy and ready to play, but your owner seems distracted, so you take matters into your own paws…

What mischievous deeds can you get away with while your owner isn’t looking? Barking at passers by, chewing things you’re not supposed to, and generally just causing havoc.

The objective of the game is to get up to as much mischief as possible without getting caught.

This game was put together in 48 hours for Kiwijam22 (theme: 'together"). As such it's currently a simple level and further enhancements are planned, including:

  • Sound effects
  • Select character
  • Personalise the dog's name
  • Additional levels, for examples: Backyard, dog park or walking down the street
  • Unlock more dog breeds

Created by William Kelly (programming) and Jessica Kelly (art), featuring Kobe Kelly (model)

A big thanks to Lauren & Vee from CODE Dunedin for setting up the space in Dunedin and helping so much over the weekend.

The game will be available to download from the google play store but has been in review since Sunday.
